已过时的 API

目录

  • 已过时的枚举
  • 已过时的字段
  • 已过时的方法
  • 已过时的枚举 
    枚举和说明
    com.google.android.filament.ColorGrading.ToneMapping
    Use ColorGrading.Builder.toneMapper(ToneMapper)
    com.google.android.filament.View.AmbientOcclusion
    use setAmbientOcclusionOptions instead
    com.google.android.filament.View.ToneMapping
    Use ColorGrading instead
  • 已过时的字段 
    字段和说明
    com.google.android.filament.Renderer.DisplayInfo.presentationDeadlineNanos
    this value is ignored
    com.google.android.filament.Renderer.DisplayInfo.vsyncOffsetNanos
    this value is ignored
  • 已过时的方法 
    方法和说明
    com.google.android.filament.View.getAmbientOcclusion()
    com.google.android.filament.IndirectLight.getColorEstimate(float[], float, float, float) 
    com.google.android.filament.IndirectLight.getDirectionEstimate(float[]) 
    com.google.android.filament.View.getSampleCount()
    use getMultiSampleAntiAliasingOptions instead
    com.eqgis.ar.ARPlane.getSubsumedBy()
    com.google.android.filament.View.getToneMapping()
    Use View.getColorGrading(). This always returns View.ToneMapping.ACES
    com.eqgis.ar.ARFrame.isDisplayRotationChanged()
    com.eqgis.eqr.utils.PresetUtils.isInPolygon(Vector3, List<Vector3>, float)
    com.eqgis.ar.ARSession.isSupported(ARConfig)
    com.google.android.filament.Renderer.mirrorFrame(SwapChain, Viewport, Viewport, int)
    com.google.android.filament.Scene.remove(int)
    See Scene.removeEntity(int)
    com.google.android.filament.View.setAmbientOcclusion(View.AmbientOcclusion)
    com.eqgis.ar.ARSession.setDisplayGeometry(float, float)
    com.google.android.filament.Texture.setImage(Engine, int, Texture.PixelBufferDescriptor, int[])
    use Texture.setImage(Engine, int, int, int, int, int, int, int, PixelBufferDescriptor)
    com.google.android.filament.View.setSampleCount(int)
    use setMultiSampleAntiAliasingOptions instead
    com.google.android.filament.Camera.setScaling(double[])
    use Camera.setScaling(double, double)
    com.google.android.filament.View.setToneMapping(View.ToneMapping)
    Use View.setColorGrading(com.google.android.filament.ColorGrading)
    com.google.android.filament.ColorGrading.Builder.toneMapping(ColorGrading.ToneMapping)
    Use ColorGrading.Builder.toneMapper(ToneMapper)
